answers.answer: It sounds like they want to talk about an induction, but don't stress! Just go to your appointment and get all the info you can from them about what is best for you and the baby!

Sounds to me its either induction or c section thats what happened to me with my daughter m doctor told me with my daughter that she was to big for me to push her out so he schedualed a c section but good luck and i wish you the best
Thanks ladies. I don't really want a c section :( but I do want what's best for my son.
How big was your daughter itsmechinita? Did you habr gestational diabetes during the pregnancy?
Thats the best way to look at it.. i was 16 when i had my daughter she would have gotten stuck she was 9lbs 11oz so the c section was best for both of us!
Yes she probably would have got stuck in the birth canal. How was healing process for the c section?
I was up and walking that night she was born at 7:40am by 7pm i was walking and eating regular food lol its different for everyone but from both of my past c sections i can say they are not that bad!

question: Nurse called me and said they need to see me earlier than July 29th because my son is quite big. And we need to talk about what is safest for baby and I. So I have to go in friday at 8 am. Do you think they will induce me they just didnt want to say?
title: SO nervous!
